title: awardee
description: I have been selected as one of the three awardees from Binus University for the GKS exchange student program. This program offers me the opportunity to embark on a remarkable academic journey for one semester in Seoul, South Korea, commencing in February 2023.

title: 1st winner
description: The award presented here recognizes the achievement of being the 1st winner among exhibitors. This award showcases Kamifriend.

title: 1st winner
association: School of Computer Science Binus University
description: I am thrilled to have received the 1st place award in the highly competitive Hackathon SoCS 2022. Our app, Kamifriend, emerged as one of the best among a talented pool of competitors. Its outstanding app design and ability to address real-world problems set it apart. This recognition showcases our team's dedication, creativity, and problem-solving skills.

title: awardee
description: After undergoing a two-month selection process, I am honored to have been awarded Beasiswa SejutaCita Batch 1 by SejutaCita Indonesia. In addition to the financial support, I am privileged to have received an official volunteer invitation to contribute to the realization of SejutaCita Indonesia's vision for education in Indonesia.

title: winner
description: I was recognized as a winner in the Friendship Without Barriers Poster Competition for my poster design. This award highlights my creative skills and ability to convey powerful messages through visual art.

title: participant
description: I was fortunate to have been selected as a participant in the International Community Development Program (ICDP) held in Malang, Indonesia. Collaborating with fellow students from around the world, this enriching program provided me with valuable insights into community development.

title: 3rd winner
program: Festival Band Temu Akrab Antar Penabur
description: As the drummer of the HOI band, our collective talent and hard work were recognized by the judges.

title: winner
description: I feel incredibly honored to have been recognized as a winner in the Ruang Xpresi talent competition, which showcased the talents of freshmen in 2021. It was a remarkable opportunity to express my abilities and be celebrated for my musical talent.

title: 1st winner
program: Groove In Beat Band Competition 2019 SKETSA
description: The HOI band, in which I played the role of a drummer, achieved the remarkable feat of winning 1st place in the Groove In Beat Band Competition 2019 SKETSA.

title: 1st winner
description: The project focused on creatively exploring the Museum Konferensi Asia Afrika (KAA) through a vlog format. Being recognized for my role as a videographer and editor is truly gratifying.

title: 3rd winner
program: Lomba Film Layar Sejarah (LASER) Pekan Raya Sejarah
description: As an editor, I contributed to a captivating short movie that caught the attention of the judges. It's a great recognition of the effort and creativity poured into the project.

title: awardee
description: I am humbled and grateful to have received the Noble Student Award, a distinction given to the top-performing students in my high school. Out of more than 900 students, I was selected as a recipient during my sophomore year. This recognition early in my high school journey serves as a testament to my dedication and academic excellence.

title: 2nd winner
description: This award is given to my team as one of the best supporting team in L'AGIE TRIOP Team Supporter Challenge.
